title: Putting client's benefit on top priority
text:
Travel Articles | October 19, 2015 
Ideally and peacefully situated in the Green Valley, Zone 3, Do Son; one of the most famous and fascinating landscapes in Vietnam and only 18 kilometers South from Haiphong. 
And much more than that, from Doson Tourists can go by canoe to Cat Ba Island, Ha Long Bay, Hon Dau Island., all of which are most well-known and favorite wonders in Viet Nam and in the world for centuries. After more than a decade of successful operation, Hai Phong Joint Venture International Tourist Corporation has gained considerable achievements and left unforgettably strong impressions on those who ever stayed with us no matter how long. 
The smartness of Doson Resort attracts guests soon by the Lobby that is designed aesthetically and luxuriously where guests can relax, enjoy various drinks viewing the picturesque garden or sit by the bar sipping and watching the bartender making up the drinks. Doson Resort Hotel Hai Phong is less than an hour's drive from the heart of the city. It is strategically positioned in Doson Town's Zone 3 and is a good springboard for daytrips to Hanoi. Its proximity to Halong Bay means guests can go canoeing to Hon Dau Island and Cat Ba Island, which are some of the tourist draws in the area. This large and opulent complex is spread over 44 hectares and features a casino. Guests can use the barbecue facilities and indulge in high quality Chinese and Western dishes at a fine restaurant. There is a large swimming pool and massage room for those who want to unwind. Arriving at Doson Resort Hotel, guests will be offered warm and professional services. With the elegant design, 88 rooms are fully – equipped and spacious, each of which has the sea view or overlooks the green, windy hills. 
Hyundai Song Gia Golf is a golfing masterpiece providing the best services and high class facilities. Totaling 27 holes including 18 Membership holes (par72, 7283 yards) and 9 Executive holes (par9,1969 yards), depending on the golfer’s ability and interest. Especially, the golf course using natural is the largest practice golf in Vietnam where the Teaching Pro Program under the guidance and instruction of members from Australian PGA is supplied. Stop at Song Gia Resort Complex to discover the wonders of Haiphong. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Car park, tours, safety deposit boxes, executive floor, shops are on the list of things guests can enjoy. The well-appointed guestrooms feature DVD/CD player, shower, kitchenette, washing machine, private pool. Access to the hotel's garden, kids club, hot tub, outdoor pool, spa will further enhance your satisfying stay. For reliable service and professional staff, Song Gia Resort Complex caters to your needs. Source:   ABOUT THE AUTHOR
